SEARCH
Package com.medilabosolutions.patient_service.service

Class PatientService

java.lang.Object
com.medilabosolutions.patient_service.service.PatientService
@Service public class PatientService extends Object
Business service for managing patient entities. Provides comprehensive CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for patients. Includes proper validation and exception handling for patient operations.

  • Method Details

    • createPatient

      public PatientDTO createPatient(PatientCreateDTO patientCreateDTO)
      Creates a new patient from the provided data.
      Parameters:
      patientCreateDTO - DTO containing data required to create a patient
      Returns:
      PatientDTO representing the created patient with its generated identifier

    • updatePatient

      public PatientUpdateDTO updatePatient(Long id, PatientUpdateDTO patientUpdateDTO)
      Updates an existing patient with the provided data. Validates that the patient exists before attempting update.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patient to update
      patientUpdateDTO - DTO containing updated patient data
      Returns:
      PatientUpdateDTO representing the updated patient
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if no patient is found with the given ID

    • deletePatient

      public void deletePatient(Long id)
      Deletes a patient by their ID. Validates that the patient exists before attempting deletion.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patient to delete
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if no patient is found with the given ID

    • getPatientById

      public PatientDTO getPatientById(Long id)
      Retrieves a patient by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patient to retrieve
      Returns:
      PatientDTO representing the found patient
      Throws:
      PatientNotFoundException - if no patient is found with the given ID

    • getAllPatients

      public List<PatientDTO> getAllPatients()
      Retrieves all patients in the system.
      Returns:
      List of PatientDTOs representing all patients Returns an empty list if no patients exist

    • deleteAllPatients

      public void deleteAllPatients()
      Deletes all patients from the system. Use with extreme caution as this operation cannot be undone. Mainly intended for testing or administrative purposes.
